jobDescription: Here is the Job DescriptionPosition: Data Analyst  Location: Austin, TX 78701  Duration: 6 months (assignment)Duties:Manage the e-mail alias inquiries from internal stakeholdersManage the headcount management tool queue to approve transfers, move positions, and unblock transactionsAssist Recruiting & HR with position management inquiries for job requisitions or offersPerform consistent and accurate headcount data entry into various information systemsMaintain and audit data integrity of headcount positions (cost center, manager, talent profile, location, team assignments, etc.) within Workday, Salesforce, and Internal ToolsAnswer database questions and reconcile systems of recordTrack changes to budget in headcount management tool and change management logWork with team to analyze data, propose process improvement, and driving system enhancementsAssist in solution testing, debugging and documentation and system issue supportSkills: Proficient in ExcelAbility to gather data from multiple sources and compile it into a user-friendly format, ensuring it meets customer needsAbility to run basic SQL queries and build Tableau dashboardExperience fielding and responding to requestsExperience investigating incorrect data patterns as well as addressing root causeEducation: Bachelor’s degree or 3+ years’ problem-solving/data experience
